post.author: 권상하
post.content:
Dear Member:

According to the online candidate profile you provided us, we've added
the following new opportunity to our website that may be of interest to
you. Please visit our web site at
http://www.cedara.com/careers/careers.htm to review it, apply for it,
or forward it to a friend.

Listing: ists
Opportunity: Technical Support Specialist
Category: Technical Support
Location: Mississauga
Opportunity Details:

Are you looking for an opportunity to build on the skills
you’ve developed in your 2+ years on a helpdesk? Would you like
to be part of a team of highly technical mentors? Do you love
helping people with their technical problems? Well, if you’ve
answered YES to these questions then we believe we have the
challenge for you.

Join our team of technical support analysts in a front line
internal technical support role. Your duties will include
providing quick response to internal customers on their
hardware, software, network and enterprise application queries.
You will spend approximately 70-80% of your time responding to
front line technical support items and the remaining portion
participating on various assignments that interest you,
projects and general departmental support activities.

Bring your independent problem solving skills and customer
service focus to the next level. You will have the opportunity
to increase your skills in and knowledge of Dell, Sun, HP,
Silicon Graphics; and the following operating systems: Win 98,
Win NT, Win 2000, Solaris, Irix, and HPUX.

Keys to your success in this role are your dedication to
customer service, ability to solve technical issues, solid
knowledge and experience with MS Office/Windows 2000/XP,
combined with good verbal and written communication skills and
your ability to hit the ground running.

Thank you,


http://www.cedara.com
post.title: Technical Support Specialist
